name: Lost Kitty Escape
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Lost Kitty Escape

Description:   In this game, can you help the cats find their way home? Think what to do when you lose a cat and try to find it back by using your problem-solving skills. Good Luck and have fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/lost-kitty-escape/

Walkthrough: 

Thanks for supporting our game, we will continue to make more fun and addicting free games :)

Cheers,

Free Room Escape
